I have extensive experience as a Scrum Master, Business Systems Analyst, and Cloud Infrastructure specialist. My diverse skill set allows me to bridge the gap between technical and business teams, ensuring seamless project delivery and alignment with organizational goals. With a strong foundation in agile methodologies, analytical problem-solving, and cloud technologies, I am dedicated to driving continuous improvement, optimizing systems, and delivering high-quality solutions that meet and exceed expectations.

projects.title: Travel Threads
projects.description: Travel Threads is a user-friendly application, developed by 5 engineers using React, Redux, CSS, and javascript. Travel Threads allows users to create and manage personalized packing lists for trips. Utilized FastAPI framework to construct a resilient backend, managing tasks like user authentication, data storage, and extraction from a PostgreSQL database. Incorporated external API's to obtain precise and current weather data for each day of the trip, thereby enhancing the packing list feature.

projects.title: Lolly Motors
projects.description: Lolly Motors is a web application for automobile dealerships to manage their sales, services, and inventory. Lolly Motors allows users to create, view, and delete services based on the automobile. Furthermore, it incorporates a VIP status functionality designed for vehicles that have undergone servicing on multiple occasions.

projects.title: Conference Go
projects.description: Conference Go is a single page application that collects and filters user input via forms, establishing communication with API microservices. Conference GO was meticulously crafted to streamline the management of conferences. Speakers have the option to register and outline their presentations, while participants can effortlessly select and register for the conference of their choice. Pertinent weather information is seamlessly integrated through the OpenWeather API.
